Text:
You know that's what I like about your posts you give credit where credit is due..

And not trying to get the glory from other people's torrents.

Good on you Kit excellent torrent as usual..;)

Its just common courtesy. I think its important that if its not my rip for the users to know where the rips come from. I can't give credit all the time since I don't always know where they come from (some stuff sits in my flac drive for a long time) and as we know torrents do dissapear.

Once again, thanks for the kind words Oan. I do what I can to help the flac community  :)


Kit

Thanks for confirming that audiochecker's algorthim isn't perfect and false positives get reported.

There's already a discussuion about this at Demonoid.

Old news lubino but thanks for trying.

Many many thanks to the uploader --first of all for using Flac to share music, and then for creating such a good torrent gathering the essential of Madonna's work.
I'll keep seeding.
